title: Readout of the President’s Call with President Mauricio Macri of Argentina – The White House
content:
Statements & Releases			

		Foreign Policy	

Issued on:
February 16, 2017
President Donald J. Trump spoke with President Mauricio Macri of Argentina yesterday and emphasized the strong and enduring bilateral ties between the United States and Argentina. President Trump underscored the leadership role that he sees President Macri playing in the region. President Trump invited President Macri to visit Washington, D.C., in the coming months.
